name: Training Pet Clicker
description:
Training Pet Clicker
Animal House Training Clicker - this app is a game that will allow you to manage and train your pet as a joke!
With the remote control you can give commands to their dog or cat! Teach it to the sound of a keychain!
Act out friends and relatives, pretend that the dog or ferret understand your commands and obeys your keychain!
Clicker for pets funny joke!
You can play a joke with a friend and try to manage your brother or sister!
Alarms and sirens at different game!
Will appeal to both adults and children alike!
Unlock all kinds of trinkets clickers!
The app has a button which should be pressed and you hear a beep!
Attention! This is only a simulator remote control clicker, he can not control of the animals!
Thank you for playing with us, leave us your feedback and evaluation, and we will consider them in future updates!
